Try CADBOXX before you buy.

Use our free demo version for as long as you like.

"This app removes the need to buy a simulation "add-on" or upgrade for your 2D pr 3D CAD system. It creates assemblies of 3D models that were created in ANY CAD or 3D system."

QUICK TO LEARN

VERY USER FRIENDLY AND EFFECTIVE WORKFLOW.

EASY TO USE

GET RESULTS FASTER AND BECOME MORE PRODUCTIVE.

Free to Start

Set up the full system for free.

Open Source

Start your journey by linking to open source platforms!

Enter a new age of Assembly Simulation

The system is provided as a Software as a Service Service. Our users pay a monthly fee to use the platform, and are offered a 30% discount for paying annually. A cadboxx is a 3D environment that was built to work with other 3D systems, but can be used on its´own. A cadboxx can be linked to Hubs and Spoke by Mozilla and the code is hosted on GitHub which means that you can host your website or app on GitHub Pages.

Users can create Virtual Reality experiences for the Web and publish them in minutes. Create 3D Games in VR. Join ANY set of 3D models from any 3D system with applied constraints. Download their work immediately and use it in any way they wish on a royalty-free basis-

Create scenes by uploading assets to Spoke where they are hosted in your own private library. Inside Spoke there is a window where the user can access the cadboxx Sketchfab library and create scenes that are a mixture of their own models and the assets hosted on Sketchfab and Spoke.

So how does it all fit together? Well the workflow would go like this. Create your models as you normally would in your favourite 3D Modeller and log on to your Spoke account. (if you have no models and are starting from nothing, then just log on to your Spoke account and start a new project). Upload your models that will be part of the assembly and drag them into your scene.

Stop waiting.
Start building.
